last_episode_to_air.name: Snow Job Too Small
last_episode_to_air.overview: The gang encounters an Abominable Snowman.

name: Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo
overview: The original thirty-minute version of Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo constitutes the fourth incarnation of the Hanna-Barbera Saturday morning cartoon Scooby-Doo. It premiered on September 22, 1979 and ran for one season on ABC as a half-hour program. A total of sixteen episodes were produced. It was the last Hanna-Barbera cartoon series to use the studio's laugh track. Cartoon Network's classic channel Boomerang reruns the series.

episodes.name: The Scarab Lives!
episodes.overview: The Scooby-Doo gang's most favourite comic-book super hero, The Scarab, comes to real life as a super villain!!! Trying to prove their hero's innocence, the gang convice the Scarab's creator to not give up drawing.

episodes.name: The Night Ghoul of Wonderworld
episodes.overview: The gang buys Velma her fantasy, which is to be ""Watson for a day"" to a robotic Sherlock Holmes in a futuristic Londonworld at the Wonderworld amusement park. Although it's all supposed to be a game, there really is a crime to be solved.

episodes.name: Strange Encounters of a Scooby Kind
episodes.overview: An alien ship kidnaps Scooby, Scrappy and Shaggy who are camping out at a construction site. It's up to Fred, Daphne, and Velma to save the three from the space ship.

episodes.name: The Neon Phantom of the Roller Disco!
episodes.overview: Sparklers Roller Disco becomes deserted due to the Neon Phantom. Trying to help the owners from an impending bankruptcy, the gang try to solve the mystery of who is the Neon Phantom.

episodes.name: Shiver and Shake, That Demon's a Snake
episodes.overview: A Snake Demon crashes the gang's summer time fun in Haiti.

episodes.name: The Scary Sky Skeleton
episodes.overview: The gang go to an air show where a Sky Skeleton ruins the aerial entertainment.

episodes.name: The Demon of the Dugout
episodes.overview: The Scooby-Doo gang investigate the appearance of the Dragon Beast at a baseball game.

episodes.name: The Hairy Scare of the Devil Bear
episodes.overview: The gang visit the Grand Canyon and stumble upon the Devil Bear, which is an old Indian legend.

episodes.name: Twenty Thousand Screams Under the Sea
episodes.overview: In Acapulco, the Sea Beast of the Aztecs rises and scares away all the divers. Of course the gang have to investigate.

episodes.name: I Left My Neck in San Francisco
episodes.overview: A Lady Vampire haunts the gang in San Francisco.

episodes.name: When you Wish Upon a Star Creature
episodes.overview: A Star Creature appears in the sky, along with a rash of thefts in the stores.

episodes.name: The Ghoul, the Bat, and the Ugly
episodes.overview: The gang attend the Batty Awards to screen the best horror film of the year. Too bad the Shadow Creature has to shred the film to pieces giving the gang yet another mystery to solve, when all they wanted to do was sit back, relax and munch down on some pop corn.

episodes.name: Rocky Mountain Yiiiii!
episodes.overview: The ghost of Jeremiah Pratt has frightened skiers and vacationers away from a mountain ski lodge where Scooby and the gang are vacationing.

episodes.name: The Sorcerer's a Menace
episodes.overview: The gang investigate the disapperance of the Black Pearl of Tonga Lei. The prime suspect is Morgan the Magician's former teacher, the Ghost of the Great Haldayne.

episodes.name: Lock the Door, It's a Minotaur
episodes.overview: The gang visit the Greek Island of Helos where they run into the terrifying Minotaur, who is half human and half bull. The Minotaur warns them to leave the island, but those meddling kids smell a big steaming pile of bull p* and want to figure out who's really in that Minotaur costume.

episodes.name: The Ransom of Scooby Chief
episodes.overview: Scooby visits his old neighbourhood where Scrappy hangs out with his old pals, Duke and Annie. As Scrappy reunites with his friends, Scooby and Shaggy are kidnapped and it's up to Scappy and his pals to rescue them.

episodes.name: A Close Encounter with a Strange Kind
episodes.overview: Scooby, Shaggy and Scrappy are kidnapped by aliens who want to observe earth creatures. The trio's antics, as they try to escape, convince the aliens that earth creatures are not worth studying.

episodes.name: A Fit Night Out for Bats
episodes.overview: Shaggy, Scooby and Shaggy have a flat tire, they decide to stay in a mansion inhabited by vampires.

episodes.name: The Chinese Food Factory
episodes.overview: While Shaggy and the dogs are on the job as fortune cookie factory watchmen, they come across a burglar.

episodes.name: Scooby's Desert Dilemma
episodes.overview: The gang are in Arabia where they meet an evil magician who wants to practice his black magic on the three tourists.

episodes.name: The Old Cat and Mouse Game
episodes.overview: The gang are visiting the Tibetan Mountains and come across a Cat Man and his gang of evil felines. The Cat Man throws Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy into the shrinking water fountain reducing them to the size of mice. In their tiny form, the three manage to eventually push the Cat Man into the shrinking water fountain and then escape. Once away from the Cat Man's hideaway the three return to their normal size.

episodes.name: Stowaways
episodes.overview: Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy mistake a boat for a floating restaurant. Once abord, they realize their mistake and spend the rest of the cruise avoiding an angry first mate who hates stowaways. To escape this dude, they use a broken lifeboat as a water ski.

episodes.name: Mummy's the Word
episodes.overview: The trio are in the Sahara Desert where thy run into a Mummy.

episodes.name: Hang in There, Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang go hang gliding, but get caught up in a wind that sends them into trouble.

episodes.name: Stuntman Scooby
episodes.overview: The gang get mistaken for movie stunt men.

episodes.name: Scooby's Three Ding-A-Ling Circus
episodes.overview: The three take jobs as circus helpers.

episodes.name: Scooby's Fantastic Island
episodes.overview: When the gang go fishing, they sail to a deserted island meeting a caveman and other prehistoric creatures.

episodes.name: Long John Scrappy
episodes.overview: A pirate kidnaps Scrappy, and Scooby and Shaggy try their best to rescue him.

episodes.name: Scooby's Bull Fright
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are bullfighters.

episodes.name: Scooby Ghosts West
episodes.overview: The gang visits a ghost town, with ghosts to boot.

episodes.name: A Bungle in the Jungle
episodes.overview: A butterfly hunt turns into a dangerous jungle excursion for Scooby and the gang.

episodes.name: Scooby's Fun Zone
episodes.overview: Scooby has to compete with a strong man at a carnival thanks to Scrappy.

episodes.name: Swamp Witch
episodes.overview:
Scooby, Shaggy and Scrappy are a Swamp Witch's dinner guests....and they're the dinner!

One of the few episodes where the Mystery Machine doesn't make an appearance.

episodes.name: Sir Scooby and the Black Knight
episodes.overview: On a Scotland trip, Scooby encounters a Black Knight.

episodes.name: Waxworld
episodes.overview: The gang visit a Wax Museum where the owners wants to add them to his collection.

episodes.name: Scooby in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Scooby dreams that he and Shaggy are in Wonderland chasing Scrappy as the White Rabbit.

episodes.name: Scrappy's Birthday
episodes.overview: Scrappy finds out all about his roots on his birthday.

episodes.name: South Seas Scare
episodes.overview: The gang's Hawaiian trip turns deadly when a Fire God starts terrorizing them.

episodes.name: Scooby's Swiss Miss
episodes.overview: Scooby falls in love with a poodle in the Swiss Alps and he proves his love when he saves her from a bear.

episodes.name: Alaskan King Coward
episodes.overview: An Ice Monster ruins the gang's gold hunting plans.

episodes.name: Et Tu, Scoob?
episodes.overview: The Colosseum is not a good place for the gang after their near scrapes with lions and warriors.

episodes.name: Soggy Bog Scooby
episodes.overview: The gang's fishing trip ends with them being terrorized by a swamp monster.

episodes.name: Scooby Gumbo
episodes.overview: It's Mardi Gra time in New Orleans. The gang would enjoy it more if they weren't chased by a dog hating cook.

episodes.name: Way Out Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang visit Mars.

episodes.name: Strongman Scooby
episodes.overview: The gang decides to join a gym to work out their muscles, even if it kills them.

episodes.name: Moonlight Madness
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs visit his ancestral home, unaware that he has a curse of a werewolf.

episodes.name: Dog Tag Scooby
episodes.overview: A visit to a military base turns into an enlistment for the gang.

episodes.name: Scooby at the Center of the World
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are terrorized by cave monsters and various other dangers while visiting Carlsbad Caverns.

episodes.name: Scooby's Trip to Ahz
episodes.overview: Scooby dreams that he is in Oz.

episodes.name: A Fright At the Opera
episodes.overview: The gang meet a real Phantom of the Opera.

episodes.name: Robot Ranch
episodes.overview: The gang visits a Robot Ranch where the master wants to turn them into robots.

episodes.name: Surprised Spies
episodes.overview: The FBI wants Scooby, Scrappy and Shaggy for a case.

episodes.name: The Invasion of the Scooby Snatchers
episodes.overview: A space alien kidnaps and clones the three friends in order to kidnap a local television station.

episodes.name: Scooby Dooby Guru
episodes.overview: The gang faces the wrath of a guard and his tiger when they visit the Taj Mahal.

episodes.name: Scooby and the Bandit
episodes.overview: Scooby, Shaggy anfd Scrappy get into it with a bunch of tough truckers.

episodes.name: Scooby Nocchio
episodes.overview: After watching Pinocchio, Scooby dreams that he, Shaggy and Scrappy are donkeys in the Paradise Island scene.

episodes.name: Lighthouse Keeper Scooby
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs wait out a storm in an old lighthouse, which happens to be haunted.

episodes.name: Scooby's Roots
episodes.overview: Scooby's relatives have the ghosts of their ancestors in their mansion.

episodes.name: Scooby's Escape from Atlantis
episodes.overview: A voyage to Atlantis puts the gang at the wrath of an evil Centaur.

episodes.name: Excalibur Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby pulls out the magical sword of Excalibur and he is made ruler.

episodes.name: Scooby Saves the World
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs end up in Outer Space where they encounter an alien hell-bent on destroying the Earth.

episodes.name: Scooby Dooby Goo
episodes.overview: Scrappy has to deal with Baby Scooby and Baby Shaggy after a steam bath mishap.

episodes.name: Rickshaw Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang go to China and encounter a Dragon.

episodes.name: Scooby's Luck of the Irish
episodes.overview: A leprechaun gives the gang all sorts of hell in this adventure.

episodes.name: Backstage Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are Marvo the Magician's assistants and have to take over when he disappears.

episodes.name: Scooby's House of Mystery
episodes.overview: A witch wants the dogs' tails for her potion.

episodes.name: Sweet Dreams Scooby
episodes.overview: When the gang is locked in a museum, they dream that they are participants in many events of American history.

episodes.name: Scooby-Doo 2000
episodes.overview: Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy travel to the future where they find out that it is not so bright.

episodes.name: Punk Rock Scooby
episodes.overview: During a rock concert, an alien look alike of Scrappy drops in and tries to destroy Shaggy and Scooby for kidnapping Scrappy, who he thinks is one of his people.

episodes.name: Canine to Five
episodes.overview: The gang work for a doctor who periodically turns into a werewolf.

episodes.name: Hardhat Scooby
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs work as construction workers for a vampire's building.

episodes.name: Hothouse Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are pursued by man eating vegetables.

episodes.name: Pigskin Scooby
episodes.overview: Scooby and Shaggy are actually in a football game playing against monsters on a team.

episodes.name: Sopwith Scooby
episodes.overview: The gang enters an airplane show where they compete against an evil Baron pilot.

episodes.name: Tenderbigfoot
episodes.overview: The gang encounters Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Scooby and the Beanstalk
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs meet up with a giant when they climb a beanstalk into his world.

episodes.name: Maltese Mackerel
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs are assigned a tough job: deliver a Maltese Mackerel to a captain of a ship.

episodes.name: Dumb Waiter Caper
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang try to clear Bugsy Burton's name on a diamond stealing case.

episodes.name: Yabba's Rustle Hustle
episodes.overview: Scrappy goes out West to help out Yabba-Doo and his human deputy.

episodes.name: Mine Your Own Business
episodes.overview: Yabba Doo and two brothers fight over a gold mine.

episodes.name: Movie Monster Menace
episodes.overview: A monster movie director really lives up to his profession when he turns actors into real monsters.

episodes.name: Catfish Burglar Caper
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang help out a Yacht Club from the latest robberies.

episodes.name: Basketball Bumblers
episodes.overview: Scooby, Shaggy and Scrappy play basketball against a cheating team.

episodes.name: Super Teen Shaggy
episodes.overview: Shaggy thinks that he is a superhero.

episodes.name: Tragic Magic
episodes.overview: A magic show provides a great diversion for two crook who intend on robbing the bank, and Yabba and Scrappy catch on.

episodes.name: Beauty Contest Caper
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are called to solve the mystery of the disappearing Beauty contest contestants.

episodes.name: Runaway Scrappy
episodes.overview: Scrappy runs away when he thinks that Yabba and Dusty don't care for him anymore.

episodes.name: Stake-Out at the Take-Out
episodes.overview: Uncle Fearless hires the gang to find his insurance company's gold.

episodes.name: Double Trouble Date
episodes.overview: Shaggy is caught in a jam when he makes two dates for one night. He hires Scooby to go out with a near-sighted girl whiel he does out with the other date.

episodes.name: Slippery Dan, the Escape Man
episodes.overview: Yabba, Scrappy, and Dusty track down an infamous escape artist.

episodes.name: Who's Scooby-Doo?
episodes.overview: Scooby and Shaggy switch bodies thanks to a machine at a Science Fair, but they can't switch back because someone steals the machine and they try to find it.

episodes.name: Cable Car Caper
episodes.overview: Two cable cars are stolen to commit a bank robbery and Scooby and the gang tries to get them back.

episodes.name: Low-Down Showdown
episodes.overview: Another criminal has escaped and its up to Yabba and the gang to put him back behind bars.

episodes.name: Muscle Trouble
episodes.overview: Against Shaggy's will, the gang is involved in a dangerous sailboat race with Muscles Malone.

episodes.name: Comic Book Caper
episodes.overview: Shaggy and the dogs stop a Slimy Creature from stealing a rare comic book.

episodes.name: Misfortune Teller
episodes.overview: As a fortune teller, Scooby gives a bully some bad advice.

episodes.name: Vild Vest Vampire
episodes.overview: A vampire named Count Zarko tries to turn the town into zombies, but not if Yabba and the gang can help it.

episodes.name: A Gem of a Case
episodes.overview: Another Malone, Fingers, steals jewels and the gang tries to get them back.

episodes.name: From Bad to Curse
episodes.overview: A queen of gypsies hires the gang to help her get back a magical amulet that was stolen from her.

episodes.name: Tumbleweed Derby
episodes.overview: Dusty and hsi horse Wildfire enter a derby where the races are fixed.

episodes.name: Disappearing Car Caper
episodes.overview: The gang tries to stop a car thief when he shrinks cars to steal them.

episodes.name: Law & Disorder
episodes.overview: Deputy Dusty is framed for a crime by two crooks and it's up to Yabba and Scrappy to clear his name.

episodes.name: Scooby-Doo and Genie-Poo
episodes.overview: Scooby gets invited to Arabia by a genie,Jasmine, and her dog Genie-Poo.

episodes.name: Alien Schmalien
episodes.overview: A alien that trashed in Tumbleweed is instantly kidnapped and placed as a circus act. It's up to Yabba and the gang to get him back to where he belongs.

episodes.name: Captain Canine Caper
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang try to protect movie star Captain Canine from a dogcatcher.

episodes.name: Close Encounter of the Worst Kind
episodes.overview: Scooby and the gang are part of a scavenger hunt put together by an alien.

episodes.name: Go East, Young Pardner
episodes.overview: Yabba, Dusty, and Scrappy travel to New York for police training.

episodes.name: Picnic Poopers
episodes.overview: A picnic is ruined thanks to a bully and his dog. Scooby and the gang tries to regain their tranquility and their appetites.

episodes.name: The Incredible Cat Lady Caper
episodes.overview: The gang tries to stop a lady Cat Burglar.

episodes.name: One Million Years Before Lunch
episodes.overview: A plane that Scooby and the gang flies suddenly enters a time warp and they end up in the prehistoric ages.

episodes.name: Up a Crazy River
episodes.overview: Yabba, Disty and Scrappy protects their town from pirates.

episodes.name: Where's the Werewolf?
episodes.overview: Scooby drinks a potion that turns him into a werewolf.

episodes.name: Bride and Gloom
episodes.overview: Yabba and the gang tries to find a bride for Horrible Homer before he destroys the town.

episodes.name: Hoedown Showdown
episodes.overview: While visiting hillbilly relatives, Scooby and the gang are caught up in a fued between their family and the McGlurks.

episodes.name: Snow Job Too Small
episodes.overview: The gang encounters an Abominable Snowman.
